title: Project Design to Enhance Mobile-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone usage skills and foundational language learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized language learning design for professionals to enhance workplace communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan mobile language learning projects by applying IMS Learning Design principles.
Learners can perform over 80% of real-time language feedback processes with peers using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Learners can successfully complete language tasks three or more times by applying TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) strategies in constrained digital environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
